name: publish-secrets-to-kv
friendlyName: Publish Secrets to Azure Key vault
description: Publish secrets to Azure Key vault in bulk and optionally add tags to each secret
author: Utkarsh Shigihalli
instanceNameFormat: Publish secrets to Azure Key vault $(keyVaultName)

inputs.name: ConnectedServiceName
inputs.label: Azure subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the Azure subscription for the key vault

inputs.name: keyVaultName
inputs.label: Key vault
inputs.helpMarkDown: Provide the name of an existing key vault

inputs.name: secrets
inputs.label: List of secrets
inputs.helpMarkDown: List of secrets to be added to the key vault. Add as `secretname=secretvalue`. Separate each pair by newline. E.g. `Password=$(MySecretPassword)`

inputs.name: tags
inputs.label: Tags
inputs.helpMarkDown: List of tags to be added to each secret. Add as `tagName=tagValue` and separate each pair by newline. E.g. `Build=$(Build.BuildNumber)`. **Note**: Any existing tags will be overwritten.

inputs.name: contentType
inputs.label: Content Type of the secrets
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the content type of secrets to assist in interpreting the secret data when it is retrieved. Usually used as a hint for interpreting the secret data. The maximum length of this field is `255` characters.
